data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Stephen is a bit old-fashioned. He ____ dresses ____, ____ in ____ environments. He ____ has a handkerchief ____ his ____, ____ a ____ watch ____! We laugh about it sometimes, but secretly we all think he's very well-dressed.
data.partBlankContent: Stephen is a bit old-fashioned. He alw___ dresses u_, ev__ in cas___ environments. He alw___ has a handkerchief i_ his poc___, a__ a poc___ watch t__! We laugh about it sometimes, but secretly we all think he's very well-dressed.
data.fullContent: Stephen is a bit old-fashioned. He always dresses up, even in casual environments. He always has a handkerchief in his pocket, and a pocket watch too! We laugh about it sometimes, but secretly we all think he's very well-dressed.
data.answer: 斯蒂芬有点守旧。他总是精心打扮，即使是在休闲的环境中。他总是在口袋里放一块手帕，还有一块怀表!我们有时对此发笑，但私下里我们都觉得他穿得很得体。
